2015 Presale Begins This Friday!

Posted on Tuesday, December 2nd, 2014 at 3:38 pm.

Written by Forecastle Crew

#GetOnboard and celebrate! We’re pumped to announce our special holiday presale for Forecastle 2015, taking place July 17-19, with a limited number of general admission weekend passes at $129.50 plus fees available for purchase starting this Friday, December 5 at noon ET!

General admission travel packages at the Brown Hotel and the Seelbach Hilton Hotel will also be available, while full ticketing options, including VIP and single day passes, as well as the festival lineup, will be revealed in early 2015.

Get full details on the presale here! Start plannin’ and set your sails to Forecastle 2015!
